info.name: Steam Enhancer Plus
info.description: This style is currently outdated but still useable. I will eventually update it when I have more times. Some of the things that are in this style are applied in other of my styles like Steam - Holiday Profile 2014 and Steam Holiday Profile 2015, and Steam - Lunar Profile. ― This style fixes various flaws left by the Steam developers on the community website. Version: 1.2.2 | View change logs
info.additionalInfo: (I'm kinda lazy these days so I didn't fix or updated much on this style) This style was created for my personal preferences, but if there is something you do not like and wish to change, all the necessary information are described inside the code in order to tell you what code does what so you can remove them or change them depending on your taste. For support, you can use the discussion form here. But if you do not receive any replies within a week, try to contact me on Steam via my profile here, or you can get in touch with me via my official group again on Steam here. You can use the group chat, to select my name in the member panel, right-click and send message to contact me directly, no need to join the group. You can enter the group chat as a guest. Or you can also try to send me a friend request if my list is not full, I am fine either way. Upcoming Re-creating the old Steam design from 2013. Change log: Click here to view the change log on docs Google. Known bugs: N/A
